# DU Racing Website - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Modern responsive website for Düzce University Motor Sports club inspired by MIT FSAE design.

## Technical Stack
- HTML5 with semantic structure
- CSS3 with Grid, Flexbox, and animations
- Vanilla JavaScript ES6+
- Inter font family from Google Fonts
- Live-server for development
- MIT FSAE-inspired minimalist design

## Project Structure
- `index.html` - Main landing page
- `about.html` - Company information
- `team.html` - Team member showcase
- `sponsors.html` - Sponsor information
- `css/style.css` - MIT-inspired styling
- `js/script.js` - Interactive functionality
- `images/` - Asset storage

## Development
Run `npm run dev` to start the development server at http://localhost:3000
